short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple. Replace Edelman with PN!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you'd like to replace all mentions of "Edelman" on the internet with "Porter Novelli", this is the extension for you. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoy a refreshing beverage after work.
